scripts.generate: openapi-generator-cli generate -i '../miro-openapi-files/openapi/merged.json' -o typescript-node -g typescript-node -t template -p npmName=miro-api && cd typescript-node && npm i && npm run build
scripts.postgenerate: rm -rf ./docs; for docs in ./*/docs; do mkdir -p "./docs/"; mv "$docs" "./docs/${docs/\/docs/}"; done
